title: One Piece Episodes 484-488: Mother? Is That You?
author: The Going Merry: A One Piece Review Podcast
description: As Marineford wraps up, there are visits from multiple unexpected guests, while Jinbe and the Whitebeard fleet are still in an all out retreat as the Marines continue their massacre. Derek reveals a couple large One Piece theories that he subscribes to.

title: WHITEBEARD DESTROYS AKAINU | One Piece Episode 484 Reaction
author: Various Reactors
description: Reaction video to the epic confrontation between Whitebeard and Akainu in episode 484, showing the emotional impact of this pivotal battle.

title: THE ONE PIECE IS REAL!!! | One Piece Marineford Episode 484 AND 485 Live Reaction!
author: Various Reactors
description: Live reaction to episodes 484 and 485 of the Marineford arc, covering Whitebeard's battle with Akainu and the arrival of the Blackbeard Pirates.

title: Anime Review: One Piece 480-484
author: Population Go
description: A detailed review of One Piece episodes 480-484, noting that episode 484 provides the biggest and boldest moment in the series without question. Emotionally impactful and powerful. A must watch.

title: The Navy Headquarters Falls! Whitebeard's Unspeakable Wrath!
author: Toei Animation
description: Official streaming of One Piece episode 484 on Crunchyroll, showing Whitebeard's devastating battle with Akainu and the arrival of the Blackbeard Pirates.

title: One Piece Episode 484 & 485 Reaction
author: Various Reactors
description: Combined reaction to episodes 484 and 485, capturing the emotional journey from Whitebeard's battle with Akainu to his final moments.
